product_name: Komperdell Powder Pro Vario PL Ski Poles - Pair - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Made with a 2-piece aluminum shaft, the lightweight Powder Pro Vario ski poles adjust for optimal handling on any terrain and compress for easier transport in packs and luggage.
